title: Microsoft Asimov's ultimate robot (PC)
brief_description: Everything you always wanted to know about robots! Explore the world of robotics. Build, animate and print your own robots using parts by Star Wars robots designer! Watch scenes from world famous movies! Explore the fascinating wold of Asimov’s robots and stories. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: a multimedia PC or compatible 386SX or higher; 4 Mb of RAM; 1-3 Mb of available hard disk space; MPC-1 compatible sound card; VGA+ graphics (640x480x256 colours);CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MS-DOS 3.1 or later.
